title: Hakushon Daimaou
opening_song: #01: "Hakushon Daimaou no Uta (ハクション大魔王のうた)" by Yuri Shimazaki
ending_song: #01: "Akubi Musume (アクビ娘)" by Mitsuko Horie
sinopse: One day Kan-chan finds a magic bottle in the attic. Whenever someone sneezes, a genie named Hakushon Daimaou is brought out and must grant any wish of whoever sneezed until he or she sneezes again. Sometimes, however, he accidentally fails and only causes trouble instead of granting any wishes.
